duties_responsibilities.duty: Schedule employee health screens and new employee orientations, and process new employee paperwork and forms.
Maintain confidential HR system records and compile reports as needed.
Provide project support for the Human Resources Department and assist as a back-up for front-office coverage.
Ensure all visitors and callers are acknowledged and greeted in a timely and professional manner.
Assist with filing and data maintenance of all forms of documents needed for verification of primary source verification.
